definition: highest in quality, the superlative form of an adjective or adverb
details:
adjective
- highest in quality
= synonyms: greatest
noun
- the superlative form of an adjective or adverb
= example: the superlative form of an adjective or adverb
= synonyms: superlative degree
- an exaggerated expression of praise
= example: an exaggerated expression of praise
- the highest level or degree attainable
= synonyms: elevation
